member.name: T:Abacuza.Endpoints.Output.ConsoleOutputEndpoint
member.summary: Represents the output endpoint that writes the output to the console.

member.name: T:Abacuza.Endpoints.Output.CsvGenericOutputEndpoint
member.summary: Represents the output endpoint for CSV/TSV files.
member.remarks: For a complete list of the options, please refer to https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/java/org/apache/spark/sql/DataFrameWriter.html.

member.name: P:Abacuza.Endpoints.Output.CsvGenericOutputEndpoint.Path
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to which the CSV should be written.

member.name: T:Abacuza.Endpoints.Output.CsvProjectOutputEndpoint
member.summary: Represents the output endpoint that writes the CSV files to the project folder.

member.name: T:Abacuza.Endpoints.Output.EmptyOutputEndpoint
member.summary: Represents the output endpoint that doesn't output anything.
